channel.title: Filameter.com on SCL Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Filameter.com on SCL Blog

item.title: Introducing FilaMeter
item.author: team@silocitylabs.com (Silo City Labs)
item.description: If you’ve ever struggled to keep track of your 3D filament spools, wondering how much filament is left or dealing with a failed print due to an empty spool, FilaMeter is the filament tracking solution you’ve been looking for. Managing your 3D printing filament inventory no longer has to involve guesswork.
